Comment: The response provides a thorough and doctrinally sound explanation of the significance of the term "Son of God" in relation to Jesus and His relationship with God the Father. The scriptural references and explanations demonstrate a solid understanding of Christian beliefs regarding Jesus as the Son of God. Great job!
